body_html:
@ezyang I can't for the life of me repro this in a test case. I think there needs to be some interaction between threads, e.g. another thread allocates and writes into that memory between when the THPObjectPtr goes out of scope and when we try to get the long value

So I'm just gonna land

body:
@ezyang I can't for the life of me repro this in a test case. I think there needs to be some interaction between threads, e.g. another thread allocates and writes into that memory between when the `THPObjectPtr` goes out of scope and when we try to get the long value

So I'm just gonna land
